summary: Westenra Manor is a home best suited for those of in favor of the macabre. It is located in the lower district of Riften across from the Ratway. When inside you will find a forge, tanning rack, grindstone, workbench, an alchemy lab and an arcane enchanter.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod so please bear with me. I worked long and hard to work out all of the bugs I could find. 

Westenra Manor is suited for players that enjoy the darker things in life. It is located in the lower district of Riften across from the Ratway. The house includes:

-5 rooms
-A forge
-A work bench
-A grindstone
-A tanning rack
-hearth and cooking pot
-an arcane enchanter
-an alchemy lab
-3 draugr containters
-4 animated book shelves
-15 bookcases
-3 weapon plaques
-6 weapon racks
-6 mannequins
-3 display cases

I really hope you enjoy my mod! If you encounter an problems while using my mod please let me know and I will try my best to solve the issue.

Install:

You can install the mod by dragging the file into the data folder

Uninstall:

You can uninstall this file by locating WestenraManor.esp in the data folder and deleting it.
author: angelofdarkness27
